mapper.update: UPDATE sys_organization SET hierarchy = CONCAT(#{targetHierarchy}, SUBSTR(hierarchy, LENGTH(#{originHierarchy}) + 1)), depth = depth - #{depthDiff} WHERE hierarchy like CONCAT(#{originHierarchy}, "-%")
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_organization WHERE hierarchy LIKE (SELECT CONCAT( hierarchy, '-', #{organizationId} , '%') FROM sys_organization WHERE id = #{organizationId})
